item.title: louis vuitton handbags online she made
item.description: carb alkaline diet and yoga workout tips Elle Macpherson is superfit at 51, thanks to an alcoholfree, low carb alkaline diet and regular workouts that include yoga, Pilates and running. Macpherson said she has aged well because louis vuitton handbags online she made health and fitness a priority many years ago. "In my 40s, I started to focus on health and wellness," Elle told Ocean Drive. "I stopped drinking 'alcohol] and taking any drugs even aspirin and I began really cleaning out my system." As a result of clean living, an organic alkaline diet and daily exercise, Elle said turning 50 wasn't traumatic emotionally or physically, as it is for http://www.lhbon.com/louis-vuitton-c-86/ many people. "By the time I hit 50, I didn't feel any sort of plateau physically, and it didn't feel like a shock emotionally either," said Macpherson. "It wasn't like, 'Oh my gosh, I'd better get myself together before I turn 50.' It was more like I was reborn." Macpherson, who was nicknamed "The Body" during her modeling heyday, has redefined middle age, but admits she works hard to maintain her agedefying beauty. Elle said her low carb alkaline diet consists mostly of "vegetables, a little bit of fish, not much protein, and no coffee or alcohol." Elle said her health improved shortly changes after she switched to the alkaline diet. "I noticed changes in just two weeks," said Macpherson. "I had more vitality, my skin wasn't dry. I stopped craving sugar, my mood stabilized, everything became more balanced. A welcome byproduct was losing weight around my middle." The alkaline diet, which Victoria Beckham also follows, includes fresh green vegetables, fruits, beans, lentils, spices, seeds and nuts. The theory is that eating a diet high in alkalineproducing foods minimizes inflammation by reducing acid buildup in our bodies (inflammation fuels aging and weight gain). Foods to avoid include sugar, coffee, alcohol, processed foods and dairy. Elle said her other antiaging beauty secrets include lots of water (she drinks three liters every day), exfoliating louis vuitton bags for sale her skin, moisturizing every day, and sleeping for a minimum of eight hours a night. No matter what, Macpherson makes a point to exercise every day, both for her physical and emotional health. "I can't ever remember doing something physical and feeling worse," she said. Macpherson said she's comfortable with getting older and has no desire to be young again. Elle, who has not gone overboard with much (or any) plastic surgery, said she prefers prefer to age naturally. "'Beauty at every age' is such a boring clich, but beauty is not just reserved for youth," Elle said. "There's a big movement that supports that. I didn't feel any kind of milestone pressure turning 50, perhaps because I've been preparing for this stage of my life for a long time."Bobbi Kristina deathbed photo sold for $100,000: Bobbi lies in funeral casketBobbi louis vuitton bags on sale Kristina Brown's deathbed photos showing her in a funeral casket have been sold to a tabloid for over $100,000. The deathbed photo was taken at Bobbi Kristina's wake, a day before her Aug. 1. item.title: Valentino Shoes Outlet tablespoon
item.description: Midnight Pudding http://www.valentinosalestore.com/ Recipe Bring on the night by melting the semisweet chocolate in the top half of a double boiler over medium heat. Stir the chocolate constantly with a rubber spatula until it is completely melted and smooth, then remove from the heat and set aside. Heat the halfandhalf, 1/4 cup sugar, and the cocoa in a 3quart saucepan over mediumhigh heat. When hot, Valentino Shoes On Salewhisk to dissolve the sugar. Bring to a boil. While the cream is heating, whisk the egg yolks, remaining sugar and cornstarch in a medium bowl until slightly thickened and lemoncolored. Pour the boiling halfandhalf mixture slowly into the egg yolks and stir to combine. Return the mixture to the saucepan and heat over mediumhigh heat, stirring constantly, until it begins to boil and becomes quite thick, about 30 seconds. Remove the pan from the heat and transfer the mixture to a large bowl. Add the melted chocolate, then place the bowl in ice water and stir the pudding until it is cold. Fold all but 2 tablespoons of chopped white chocolate into the pudding. Portion 3/4 cup of the pudding into each of 4 dessert dishes and sprinkle 1/2 Valentino Shoes Outlet tablespoon of the remaining white chocolate over the top of each.

item.title: Desktop view is fine, mobile isnt
item.description:
Hello
I'm bulding my little website using the "boulevard" theme. I've added few comments to the custom css: http://www.pic-upload.de/view-27595532/css.png.html
I've moved the site title and the navigation on the same line, using " position: relative; bottom: 45px;". I know it isnt optimal, but thats how far I got with my understanding...
To the problem: This is how it looks on a desktop: http://www.pic-upload.de/view-27595531/desktop.png.html This is how it looks on a mobile device: http://www.pic-upload.de/view-27595533/mobile.png.html
As you can see the site title is over the navigation, pretty useless what I've crafted here...
Can any one help me to get this working on one line on mobile devices too?
Cheers Josh

Ira

item.title: Moving the token site to my root domain address / URGENT HELP!
item.description:
Hello. I read in the Admin section of the Koken control panel that this process seems to be simple.
The section called " Site URL" explains this:
"Defines the URL your Koken site is viewed with. You may edit this to your domain root or to a specific directory. If an assigned directory doesn't exist, Koken will create it for you."
I need more precise instructions to do this. It sounds all too vague to me, specially after reading users comments about loosing all their original content ( something apparently related with a replaced htaccess file that is created by koken.
I have not yet tried anything, but I am ready to move my site, using Madison 2 ( jorgeparra.com/koken) to become the main site ( jorgeparra.com), but I want to make sure I do it the right way, and I need assistance with that.
Many thanks!
Jorge

item.title: Publishing more than one homepage
item.description:
Hi. I really like how everything functions for the Regale 2 theme. Notably, the home page with sliding images, and the simple & clean links to photos and/or video. I was wondering, is there a way to publish multiple, mini-sites (home page with 2-3 simple links to Info, Photo & Video) within one website. For example:
MAIN HOME PAGE > Link 1 > Home Page + Info Link + Photos Link + Video Link > Link 2 > Home Page + Info Link + Photos Link + Video Link > Link 3 > Home Page + Info Link + Photos Link + Video Link
I wouldn't even need any links on the main home page to Link 1, Link 2 or Link 3. I'd just be using the url's from each Link created.

item.description:
Hi Everyone,
I've got a question/feature request regarding pagination and breadcrumbs. Currently, when a user views an image from an album and breadcrumbs are enabled, the link inside the breadcrumbs leads back to page 1 of the album, not the page containing the image the user clicked on. Is there a way around this or is this just how Koken's breadcrumbs and pagination work right now?
And by the way, this is using the Elementary theme for a client asset delivery website.
Thanks, Brett

item.title: Pre-Caching Uploaded Images? Part 2
item.description:
I'm going to offer a possible solution to people who wanted to rebuild all their images caches so the first site visitors don't have to wait for the server to render the images. The thread I was responding to had a "This question has received the maximum number of answers." On it though, so I thought I'd just start a new one.
It's possible to use a utility like wget running on your own local computer to simply access every link on your website and trigger the cache build. http://www.guyrutenberg.com/2014/05/02/make-offline-mirror-of-a-site-using-wget/ Wget can be installed in osx from macports or brew. Wget is also available for windows. It's included with most linux distributions as well.
Basically wget downloads a copy of your website, so all images will be built. I run it after making major changes and it works well. There may also be other utilities that download entire websites which will work as well.

item.title: from the witches celine bag to
item.description:
Fantasy holds a special place in the hearts of everyone, be it adults or children. The legend of the tooth fairy recounts the tale of a magical fairy who awards the children for the teeth that have fallen off. So every time your tooth broke off, you would place it under the pillow and lo and behold! the next morning you would be awarded with money and little treats. Of course, sometimes the kind fairy would allow your parents to keep the tooth while rewarding you as well. This magical fairy also provides the inspiration for very beautiful Halloween costumes for kids and equally hilariously funny costume ideas for adults. For the costume, you can include a white or pink corset tops, "poofy" skirts with trims, tiara, and shimmery wings. Not to forget, a sequined fairy tooth wand. This hilariously funny costume can lighten the mood in any room with its outrageous looking white imprinted tank top, a pair of white shorts, a pair of white wings, and a headpiece made of molar cutouts. My sixyearold niece wanted to dress up as a tooth fairy last Halloween. Dressed up in a gorgeous poofy dress, a tiara, matching fairy slippers, and beautiful sequined wings, she looked an adorable darling. Tooth fairy costumes with the wings and the tulles skirts are fairly easy to make.
For making this beautiful costume, select a big poofy white dress. Alternately, you can make your very own fairy tutu by measuring and cutting the tulle and attaching them to an elastic in a 'U' shape. Now sew in the toothbrushes and floss packs onto your [b]http://www.celinehandbagse.com/ [/b] skirt. For the fairy necklace, thread the gum onto a piece of string. Wings for your little tooth fairy can be made of poster boards and covered with glitter foil. Attach strings to secure it over the shoulders. A magical fairy wand, a bag of fake cold coins, and a tiara made of teeth can complete the look of the perfect tooth fairy.
The origin of the tooth fairy is a mystery with some attributing it to an old European tradition where the teeth of little children was buried and hidden from the witches to prevent them from being cursed. This tradition was carried on as children began hiding their teeth under the pillow, expecting gifts and money from the tooth fairy. [b][url=http://www.celinehandbagse.com/]celine bag[/url][/b] The fancy tooth fairy costumes are a great way of having loads of fun this Halloween.

Denis

item.title: cheap beats by dre Psychosis
item.description: Cons of Medical Marijuana beats pill The use of marijuana to treat medical conditions has been debated by health care experts, both having significant clinical claims for and against its use. Medical marijuana can help to stimulate appetite in cancer and AIDS patients. It also helps to alleviate some of the symptoms of glaucoma and multiple sclerosis. Although medical marijuana beats by dre headphones on sale is generally favored by its patients, there are several arguments against its medical use and effectiveness. The arguments against the use of medical marijuana include the increased risk of psychosis, inferior effectiveness in treating glaucoma and increased risk in developing certain types of cancer. Increased Risk of cheap beats by dre Psychosis One of the arguments against the use of medical marijuana centers around its increased risk of both acute cheap beats by dre headphones psychosis and chronic mental illness, including schizophrenia. Marijuana is a powerful psychoactive drug and can have serious effects on the mind and body outside of its intended medical use. Some of the psychoactive side effects of using marijuana include hallucination, anxiety, memory loss and confusion. In the August 2007 issue of "The Lancet," Dr. Stanley Zammit and associates found a strong significant relationship between marijuana use and increased risk of psychosis, including severe anxiety, depression and suicidal tendencies. Dr. Sonija Luzi and associates, at the Institute of Psychiatry in London, state that two primary chemical agents found in marijuana, tetrahydrocannabinol and endocannabinoids, proved largely responsible for inducing the psychotic symptoms in marijuana users. Inferior Treatment beats wireless of Glaucoma Marijuana has been associated with treating glaucoma, an eye disease, since the 1970's. The National Eye Institute states that early studies showed that marijuana smoke lowered the cheap beats by dre studiointernal pressure inside the eye caused by glaucoma. In its early interventions in the 1970's, marijuana proved beneficial in treating the disease, but new medications and treatments have rendered marijuana as an inferior choice for this particular disease. Current treatments employ medications approved by the Food and Drug Association as well as laser surgery. The side effects of medical marijuana such as increased heart rate and decreased blood pressure have raised concerns cheap beats by dre mixr headphones that it may not be the most effective current choice for treating glaucoma. Increased Risk of beats by dre pro headphones sale Certain Cancers Another argument against the use of medical marijuana asserts that marijuana increases the risk of developing certain types of cancer such as lung and testicular cancer. The National Institute on Drug Abuse states that marijuana smoke can cause cancer of the respiratory tract because of the irritants and carcinogens it contains. They stated that marijuana smoke contains 50 to 70 percent more carcinogenic hydrocarbons than tobacco smoke. In addition, they stated that one of the active ingredients in marijuana, tetrahydrocannabinol, was significantly associated with respiratory infection and tumor growth. In addition, a study by Dr. Stephen Schwatz and associates at the beats by dre solo hd headphones Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center found that smoking marijuana increased the chances of developing testicular cancer by about 70 percent. One of the reasons why marijuana may cause cancer is because it is significantly linked to DNA damage, which may initiate tumor growth, according to Dr. Rajinder Singh and associates at the Cancer Biomarkers and Prevention Group in Sweden. http://www.hjbon.com/moncler-women-coats-c-72_74/ http://www.balenciagatop.com/ http://www.garebibber.com/ http://www.airjordanhot.com/air-jordan-4-shoes-9/ http://www.airjordanon.com/air-jordan-9-c-71/ http://www.limitedbeatsbydre.com/beats-by-dre-wireless-c-28/ http://www.celinehandbagse.com/celine-trapeze-c-71/

item.title: Body add code
item.description:
Hello, First, congratulations on track and to become an excellent application.
- I need to add code to third parties applications in code (BODY) Where is it found?
I await your response. Best regards and thank you very much

item.title: How to add TAGS to RSS feeds
item.description:
How can I add an image's TAGS to the Recent.rss ?
Is it a simple modification?
Thanks, Matt

item.title: Size of images displayed in album view
item.description:
Hi,
I am trying to modify the size and setup of images being displayed in album view. In all themes I have checked the images are displayed 1 per line and rather huge - already in the same size as if there were displayed as single image, i.e. leaving no reason for the user to actually switch to single image view at all. I would like to have them more in a thumbnail style, e.g. 3 or 4 per line, clearly smaller than in single image view. However, there does not seem to be a setting in Koken to modify the image size at all, right? I have found vague hints to modify this using the CSS editing possibilities but not how.
For example, when using the default "timeline" view, there is a similar way of displaying images smaller and more than one in a row. However, I do not need a timeline view for my web site and have therefore removed it, but is there a way to use the same setup for album view?
Thanks a lot, Tim

item.title: Lightbox in madison 2
item.description:
Hello, i bought the theme "madison 2". is it possible to disable the lightbox? i do not wont the link to the lightbox when i klick on images.
thank you and best regards Robert Buergel

item.title: Web Link on Website
item.description:
GM, With your website can I add a link to a news article on the front page? I would like to put that article on our front page of our website. Thank you, Bobby Flores
http://www.pe.com/articles/valley-765177-murrieta-grand.html

item.title: Multiple Fullscreen Slideshows?
item.description: From the best I can tell, there are only two of the paid themes (Madison 2 & Regale 2) that allow a full page slideshow (only the splash page). I would like to have multiple full screen slideshows on my site. Is that possible on any of the themes?

item.title: Albums in categories
item.description:
Hello,
I'm using Axis theme and I would like to something like this : http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/184841koken.jpg
I tried to create an album template by I only can filter items by one category.
Do you have any idea?
Thank you so much

item.title: How do I put content under different pages
item.description:
Hi
It might be the simplest thing but I cannot work out how to put different images under different pages. Under the site tab I have say page1, page2, page3. How do I take the images and put them in different pages. At the moment I have them all on the home page and within libabry tab they are all under the 'content' tab.
Thing is I don't see page1,page2,page3 under the the Libby tab but they exist in the 'Site' tab.
Thanks Sherry

item.title: site title
item.description:
Hi
How do i get rid of my site title /koken? Everybody who's using koken.me doesn't have that. Why do I have it? If you enter www.lauraknipsael.com it automaticly appears.
Can you please help me this time? Months ago I also send an email but never got any reply back..
Thanks a lot, Laura Knipsael

item.title: Removing Social Share from Lightbox
item.description:
Hi, firstly thanks for a great cms system geared for galleries.
I have gone through both theme and template setting for all my pages and have successfully turned off the social share icons. The only place I have not been able to remove them from is when users view an album using lightbox. Is there a way to disable this feature?
Many Thanks.

item.title: photograph titles
item.description:
Hello,
I am using Boulevard Theme. I was wondering if there is a way I can set the imported images to automatically add the file name / alt tag to the caption. This would be great as I have large volumes of images to upload and adding the image titles for each image is not convenient at all for my workflow...
Are the theme template files available to edit incase inserting some php into the span would be the best solution?
Any ideas would be great to know !
Thank
david

Hi,
When I try and remove /koken/ from the site URL under site publishing it does not change and after clicking save it puts /koken/ back into the URL.
How can I make it so that it will accept the site root URL?
I am running it on a Windows Server 2012 R2 machine and IIS 8. Are there specific folder permissions I need to set?
Thanks

My site will only publish to www.deannapizzitelli.com/koken, and directly to my domain.

item.description:
*Sorry, I posted this already in the wrong category so I moved It here*
Is it possible to display a list of essays as if they were photos in an album... with a small thumbnail as a preview?
or alternatively, would it be possible to display photos on a custom page in a grid/mosaic fashion that has multiple rows and columns, which I can then link each image to a certain essay? At the moment I can only display essentially one column of images.

Bambi K

item.title: Embedding entire albums or galleries into a predesignated website.
item.description: Is it possible to embed an album into another page? For instance, I built a site already and want to use Koken as a tool to create a web gallery/album and then place this album into a jQuery Tab on a site that I have hand coded. Is this possible? I'm struggling to find a tool as powerful as Koken that has this feature. I would love to be able to click to generate an embed script for my site.

item.title: Koken + Cloudflare + Google Chrome

My website is properly displayed on Firefox or Safari but there is no album displayed on google chrome
You have to reload the webpage to see that page correctly.
Regards,
Chris

item.title: Koken hosting
item.description:
Hello,
For your information, I've bought the domaine name "koken.website" today to allow user to host their website.
Price will be, I think, not expensive : 30€/year with 3rd level domain, and around 50€/year, with domaine name (.com, be, fr, etc), 1gb disk space max and email adress and, Koken installed, for sure !! :)
Thanks a lot for your wonderfull CMS !!
Frédéric http://www.frch.be/ http://www.diamond-valley.com/

item.title: Changing site design
item.description:
Hi - I wonder if anyone can help.
I've designed a site, published it and it is active. However, I now want to COMPLETELY change the design to a new version, but it's likely to take me some time to develop as it's a going to be a bit customised.
If I change the URL in Site Publishing to a temporary directory whilst I work on the new design, will the active site remain working until the new one is ready, as obviously I don't want to replace the existing site until the new one is ready.
I have asked Koken (twice) this question - but it seems they are too busy to answer.
Many thanks for any help.

item.description: In the Edit panel (Texts/Drafts) I am seeing five images which do not appear in the preview. If I publish the essay the images still do not appear. I have restarted, emptied cache, reloaded, many times. Nothing I try will make the images appear.

Thanks

When I click on Home in the breadcrumb menu I want to go directly to the albums and not to some other page. Please help. Setting up redirects to try to bypass this problem also didn't help me much.

Plug-in error log for plug-in at: /Volumes/Macintosh HD/Dropbox/Documents/Chris/PHOTO/PluginsLR/koken.lrplugin

An error occurred while attempting to update the settings for this collection. Saving album failed. The server did not return an error message. Contact Koken support for more help.

item.title: Warmup the cache

Thanks, Sylvain

is there any possibility to export and import all the settings I did for a theme (here: Madison 2)? For I have to port my theme to another installation and I don't want to do all the visual setup again.

item.title: Wrong URL after migrate
item.description:
Hi koken team,
I've migrate my website to a new server and now not under a sub-domain. Some images are always linked with the URL of the sub-domain.
You can see the problem here http://www.christophepenninckx.com/albums/hong-kong/
Try to share and you will see the old URL with the sub-domain : vps
What can I do to solve the problem ?
Regards,
Chris

item.title: Text below images in gallery
item.description:
Hi there,
I am trying to remove the date published and file name information of all my photos in the gallery. I can't figure out how to remove them and they are unnecessary/look bad, any help is greatly appreciated.
Regards, Matthew

item.title: Pointing URL to my Koken site
item.description:
Hello there,
I'm rather in the dark about how to get my url samtootal.com to point to my Koken build which is sitting in the root folder of my host server.
I currently have a wordpress site attributed to the url but would like to replace this with my new shiny and amazing Koken build :-)
Please help, very excited about getting the new site live.
Many thanks, Sam Tootal

item.title: Pixelated images
item.description: I am having some issues with images coming up highly pixelated. I've cleared the image cache in the Image Publishing sections in options and tried all 3 processing options. Two being Imagemagik and one being GD. There always seems to be some images that are pixelated, but not all of them. I'm using the Boulevard theme. Is there a way to force just single images to be re-rendered? It would make this a whole lot easier.

item.title: Problems with Lightroom 5.7
item.description:
Hi,
I am using Koken (updated yesterday to 0.20.5) with the newest Lr-Plugin and Lr 5.7. If I try to upload a new album, I'll get
AgExportSession:recordRemoteCollectionId: remote ID must be a number or string
but re-upload an existing album is no problem. So this error is only shown if I create new albums. Do you have any idea, how I can fix this?
Thanks!

item.title: Option to set the size of the images in my content feed
item.description:
Is there an option to set the image size of my content feed (http://zugegensein.de/feed/content/recent.rss).
I currently try to setup a MailChimp campain with this rss feed and the image within the feed is to big for an email campain.
I would like to control the image size.

item.title: Assigning cover photo to set
item.description:
Hello All,
I have a link on my homepage (Vehicles) that links to all the vehicle pictures I take. When clicking on that link, I am taken to the page that has different sets listed by the car manufacturer. For example, Volvo, Audi, etc. When clicking on one of those sets, it shows the different albums for that specific manufacturer. For example when clicking on Audi, you will see albums within for A4, A5, A6, etc... I would like to know if there is any way that I can assign a cover photo for the car manufacturer sets?
Vehicles>Car Manufacturer Set>Model Albums or Vehicles>Ford Set>Mustang Album
How can I put a Ford Logo as a cover for the Ford Set? And I don't want it to be any picture I have from the albums within it. I guess that's the key point.
Thank you!

item.title: Display of Vertical Images on AXIS II Albums
item.description:
Hi there, I currently have my website running with the AXIS 2 theme and overall I am very impressed. I do however have a question in regard to the display of vertical images in the album view.
I predominately shoot panoramas with an aspect ratio of 3:1. The horizontal (vast majority of my images) images look fantastic! However the thumb nails for any vertical image look enormous in comparison to the horizontal images (this is exacerbated due to my aspect ratio of 3:1 - which means vertical images can display up to nine times the size).
Example (please refer to the vertical images at the bottom of the page): http://www.timwrate.com.au/albums/outback/
I was wondering if you were able to cap the vertical size of a thumbnail in the album view.
I think this may be possible with CSS - but I'm not that familiar with code.
Many thanks,
Tim

item.title: Album Cover Error
item.description:
I followed the instructions to change the album cover and even after the pop-up message claims a specific image has been made the album cover, this is not reflected in the live site.
I am using the Ensemble theme.
Kind Regards,
T Barker

item.title: How do I control vertical spacing between elements?
Integrate Koken in static Website
item.description:
Hi there,
Sorry if this is a dumb question or if it's in the wrong category but any help is really appreciated.
I have a portfolio website already, static and hand coded, and want to incorporate koken into the two pages that display the images, rather than to move my whole site over to koken and try to incorporate it into a custom theme. I'm comfortable using the lens tags to display content but can I use them on a static page in a similar way you can use the wordpress loop? Any links to articles about incorporating koken for a gallery in a static page would be really helpful. I've done a google search and cant find anything...
cheers Philip

item.title: Front page not loading properly
item.description:
Hi, when I go to my web page (www.javanng.com) after I used Koken, I get a list of files in that directory rather than a front page - the admin panel works when I click on preview.php - but there is no public front page. Please help!
Many Thanks
Javan

item.title: Remove index.php from Links
item.description:
I have a problem with index.php. I tried different codes with htaccess but nothing worked and the code i find for removing index.php leads to an internal error page.
I also proofed that mod rewrite is enabled and is working.
I think the htaccess files have wrong links but i dont get it to work with my directory.
My .htaccess and index.php files are in the same folder /. Then i have koken installed in /koken My htaccess works with this code only.
## Rewrite Rules (Pretty URLs) ## These rules remove index.php/ from your published site links ## and also speed up the serving of cached images.
RewriteEngine On RewriteBase /koken
# Pass images requests back to PHP if they do not exist RewriteCond %{REQUEST_METHOD} =GET RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} /koken/storage/cache/images(/(([0-9]{3}/[0-9]{3})|custom)/.*)$ RewriteRule . /koken/i.php?path=%1 [L]
## This ruleset ensures core Koken JS and CSS are cached ## for 1 year. These files are always timestamped in new releases, ## so it is safe to cache them for long periods of time.
ExpiresActive On # Set default to 0 so .php/API requests are not cached ExpiresDefault A0
# Do not cache MP4s, as Chrome and others tend to fail on first playback
ExpiresActive Off Header set Cache-Control "private, no-cache, no-store, proxy-revalidate, no-transform" Header set Pragma "no-cache"
# Console javascript and CSS is timestamped and can be aggressively cached
ExpiresByType text/javascript "access plus 1 year" ExpiresByType application/javascript "access plus 1 year" ExpiresByType application/x-javascript "access plus 1 year" ExpiresByType text/css "access plus 1 year"
# Cached images are timestamped and can be aggressively cached
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 year"
## End Rewrite Rules
############################################ ####### END KOKEN .htaccess rules ######## ############################################
I also noticed i cant dele storage/cache/api...but i tried setting 777 and didnt work.. but i tried some things with wordpres and there are no problems set 777 to my files.

item.title: URLS
item.description:
Hi There,
I wondered if there is any way to not have album in the URL, for example:
http://hellomozart.co.uk/index.php?/albums/trailers/ Is it possible to have it as: http://hellomozart.co.uk/trailers
Thanks in advance for your help,
Jason

item.title: Madison 2 Theme - Responsive or not?
item.description:
I've spent the last week, on my desktop, putting together a site using the Madison theme.
The desktop monitor is big and the site looks great on it.
My problem is that, when viewed on my laptop, a scroll bar appears on the right of the screen for the Homepage image. There is only one image on the Homepage.
The site looks worse when viewed on my iPhone, when all that appears is the image - no side menu, unless I click on the icon on the top left corner.
Am I right in thinking that the Madison theme is not Responsive, in the traditional web-design sense of the term?
I would like my site to look the same across all devices. While a scroll bar on a laptop is just about acceptable, the viewing experience on a mobile phone is not. (I don't own a tablet, so I haven't had a chance to check.)
If Madison isn't Responsive, are any of the Koken themes?
You have a superb product. I hope I'm wrong in my take on its Responsiveness.
Thanks.
D.

item.title: Changing Twitter and Facebook name links to .gif buttons. How?
item.description:
I have inputted my Twitter and Facebook details via Settings/Administrator, and I have published them on my Madison site via Add Links.
I now have the words Twitter and Facebook in the left column, and if I click on them, I'm taken to my respective pages. Great.
But, I'd like them to be .gif buttons, not words.
How can I make this change?
Thanks.
D.

item.title: Madison 2 / Splash slideshow / iPad problem
item.description:
My new website is made with Madison 2 and it runs perfect on my iMac and iPhone 6. But I have a curious problem on my iPad air. In landscape mode the site is shown really good, no problems. But if I turn the iPad to the portrait mode, vertical I mean. the splash slideshow does not run. I only see the navigation and a spinning wheel, no pictures.
I am full of hope that someone can help me.
The url of my site: http://www.yef.info
Peter
